data.title: CONNECTED BENEFITS
data.subtitle: Optimize your benefits for when you need them the most
data.description: Get notified when you may be eligible for automatic benefit payouts and enhancements from certain plans offered by your employer.

stepContent.stepDescription: Complete the form below so we can verify your identity before proceeding.

data.title: Verify Your Identity
data.subtitle: MetLife will send you a verification code. How would you like to receive this code?
data.textMessageDisclaimer: Standard text messaging rates may apply.

data.title: Verify Your Identity
data.description1: A text message with a verification code has been sent to:
data.description2: Your code will expire in 15 minutes.
data.resendCodeStep1: Please verify that your email/phone information is correct.
data.resendCodeStep2: Make sure to check your email spam folder.
data.resendLinkText: Click here to resend the code

data.title: Include Your Adult Dependents
data.subtitle: Your adult dependents (18 years and over) must consent individually. If you would like us to send them a consent link, please provide their email address.

data.title: Your benefits are connected!
data.subtitle: You will be automatically notified when you are eligible to receive a payout from your MetLife insurance.
data.description: You can manage your benefits simply and easily on
data.description2: If you don’t have an account, you can create one now. You don’t have to create an account in order to be notified of your connected benefits and enhancements.

data.title: Your benefits are connected!

stepContent.termsOfUseCheckboxText: I have read and agree to the
stepContent.legalDisclaimer: By agreeing to our eConsent policy you consent to receive Policies/Contracts and Disclosures electronically, where applicable by law. Not all communications are available via email or SMS for all products so you may still receive mail. Communications required by law will be mailed to you or sent electronically, whichever is available.
